recipes.title: Cauliflower gravy
recipes.description:
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/dDa4Lda_zRo

add 2 tbsp oil,  sombu 1 tbsp, ginger garlic paste, curry leaf

add 1 chopped onion,  2 chopped green chili, 1 chopped tomato, 

add 1 tsp: turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala,  1/2 tbsp jeera powder,
add 2tbsp coriander powder

add water and cook
add cauliflower

recipesLibrary.title: Oatmeal, greek yogurt, blackberry, chia seeds
Avarakkai Poriyal / Broad Beans Curry
recipesLibrary.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UDzpSwCChgw


Avarakkai Poriyal

Ingredients
Roasted peanuts  3 tbl spoon
Coconut  3 tbl spoon
Dry chilli  3
Coriander seeds  1 teaspoon
Cumin seeds   teaspoon
Oil  1 tbl spoon
Mustard   teaspoon
Urad dal   teaspoon
Dry chilli  1
Garlic cloves  3
Curry leaves
Chopped shallots  8 to 10
Broad beans (Avarakkai)  300 grams
Turmeric powder
Salt

recipesLibrary.title: Broad beans Pepper kootu |
recipesLibrary.description:
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/ahxBH-578V4


Ingredients:
Broad beans (Avarakkai)  1 cup, chopped
Moong dal   cup
Black pepper  2 tsp  
Cumin  1 tsp
Grated coconut  1/4 cup
Rice flour-1 Tbsp
Turmeric   tsp
Asafetida-1/2 tsp
Salt  to taste

Tempering:
Coconut oil  1 tsp or Ghee-1 tsp
Mustard seeds   tsp
Urad dal-1 tsp
Cumin-1/2 tsp
Curry leaves  few


Steps:
1. Wash moong dal thoroughly and add it to the pot. You can choose to cook in pressure cooker too. 
2. Then add the washed chopped broad beans and add salt, asafetida, turmeric. 
3. Prepare the grinding items by adding coconuts,pepper, cumin, rice flour and 1/4 cup of water and grind it to a smooth paste. 
4. Add the puree to the pot, and mix and close the lid and seal the valve.
5. Set the instant pot on high on pressure cooking mode for 5 minutes. 
6. Choose to let it release automatically or manually.
7. And mix it well, and add curry leaves and temper in ghee or coconut oil, and garnish.
